issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
In 4.2 we now allow Query API requests without a version parameter.

Example request with euca2ools after commenting out the API_VERSION in /usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/euca2ools/commands/ec2/__init__.py:

{code}

  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/command.py", line 305, in run

    instance_line.append(instance.get('placement', {}).get(
AttributeError: 'str' object has no attribute 'get'
{code}

The response should be sent with the current default version for the API.
fields.summary: EC2 response incorrect when Version parameter not present in request

comments.body:
We now use the default version for the service with query APIs when the version parameter is missing or empty.

QA run:
http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Master/1803/

Verified std response is:
<DescribeImagesResponse xmlns="http://ec2.amazonaws.com/doc/2014-06-15/"><requestId>5baa0d24-66b3-45ae-bd9d-ca2bb32e4499</requestId><imagesSet/></DescribeImagesResponse>
After commenting out API_VERSION, response shows newer version string:
<DescribeImagesResponse xmlns="http://ec2.amazonaws.com/doc/2015-04-15/"><requestId>6582eb42-9ef0-4a37-9026-66fbd1755a5a</requestId><imagesSet/></DescribeImagesResponse>
